title: [GAMEPLAY] Orianna Second Non-Functioning Ball Indicator

embed.description: Share multiple photos at once! No registration, bulk image upload, short intuitive URLs and free unlimited image hosting. Tweet, Pin, post on Facebook and get embed codes easily!

body:
About 15 minutes into a Normal game on Summoner's Rift, I noticed Orianna had two "ball indicators" around her. One was fully functional: changing sides and colour relative to the ball position. The second one stayed blue and was always pointing to the left, regardless of the position of the ball (her shield included). I didn't notice it when everyone spawned in, so either I was dumbly oblivious or it was triggered by something in the game. The link leads to pictures demonstrating this more clearly.

I have not gotten the chance to play Orianna again since, so I have not replicated the issue, but [here is a link to the game information](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2008264833/215933579) in case it had something to do with specific items or events. (We lost :c)

EDIT: Second game as Orianna in an effort to replicate the issue actually garnered me TWO additional non-functioning indicators, along with the typical working one. Adding screencaps from that game to the original link.
